author: Phil Ward
description: As a born and bred Londoner, I'm slightly miffed that a New Yorker has applied the name of our great city to a drink using French and Italian products, but as it's Phil Ward and a great gin-based drink, I'll forgive him and mix up another.
name: Londoner (Ward's recipe)

recipeInstructions.text: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass
